title: Why Is This One Task Always Passed On To Moms Instead Of Dads?
description:
A tweet went viral about a woman doing a social experiment with the dads of her three-year-old classmates. She asked them for their email to send out invites for her son's party. Every single one of the dads gave her their wives' email.
Why? We discuss.
